title: Snake-classic
description: A simple snake game application built with Unity 3D

title: Snake & Ladders Game
description: Early days of developing application. A simple GUI application built with Java Spring, to play snake and ladders game, using Java Swing and Threading

title: Who is the thief
description: An android game application. It's a lottery game. Developed early uni days, to digitize a childhood game. It can be played by at max four players  and at least 1. It is supposed to be a four player game, so the rest of the positions are filled by computer, to play lottery.
